title: Cardamom-maple salmon fillets
ingredients: ['1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons grapeseed oil', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 (900g) salmon fillet, sliced into 3 into pieces']
